comments: Reva was a very good professor. She was tough but very good. She made sure that you walked out of her class at the end of the semester knowing most of what she taught. Thumbs up!

Greenberg is nice and a very informative teacher, but she assigns far too much work for a 100-level course. The amount of reading and writing required is more appropriate for a 300-level class. However, if you are interested in the subject matter, you will walk away with a wealth of information. Just keep up with the reading!
I dropped after a few classes. Extremely boring lectures. Made you do presentations. gave ridiculous amounts of work for a general education class.
